quests.name: Tutorial Island
quests.short_hint: Follow the on-screen instructions and talk to each instructor in sequence.

quests.name: Cook's Assistant
quests.short_hint: Talk to the Cook in Lumbridge Castle kitchen and bring him milk, egg, and flour.

quests.name: Sheep Shearer
quests.short_hint: Talk to Farmer Fred, shear sheep, spin the wool in Lumbridge, and return balls of wool.

quests.name: The Restless Ghost
quests.short_hint: Talk to Father Aereck in Lumbridge church, then Father Urhney in the swamp, and help the ghost.

quests.name: Rune Mysteries
quests.short_hint: Speak with Duke Horacio in Lumbridge, then deliver the talisman and notes to wizards.

quests.name: Demon Slayer
quests.short_hint: Talk to Gypsy Aris, retrieve the keys around Varrock, and defeat the demon with the silverlight sword.

quests.name: Shield of Arrav
quests.short_hint: Speak to Reldo in Varrock Palace and join either Phoenix Gang or Black Arm Gang to recover the shield halves.

quests.name: Vampire Slayer
quests.short_hint: Talk to Morgan, then Dr Harlow in the pub, and prepare to fight the vampire in Draynor Manor.

quests.name: Goblin Diplomacy
quests.short_hint: Help the goblin generals decide on armor colour by providing the dyes they want.

quests.name: Imp Catcher
quests.short_hint: Talk to Wizard Mizgog and collect the imp beads he needs.

quests.name: Doric's Quest
quests.short_hint: Talk to Doric and bring him the ores he requests.

quests.name: The Knight's Sword
quests.short_hint: Help the Squire replace a lost sword by speaking with key NPCs and getting special ore for a master smith.

quests.name: Pirate's Treasure
quests.short_hint: Talk to Redbeard Frank, travel and follow the clues to dig up the treasure.

quests.name: Prince Ali Rescue
quests.short_hint: Help free the prince by gathering disguise and escape items, then infiltrating and freeing him.

quests.name: Black Knights' Fortress
quests.short_hint: Sneak into the Black Knights' Fortress and sabotage their mysterious weapon.

quests.name: Dragon Slayer I
quests.short_hint: Earn permission from the Champions' Guild, gather ship, crew, and ship items, and defeat the dragon on Crandor.

quests.name: Witch's Potion
quests.short_hint: Talk to Hetty and bring her the ingredients for a magic-boosting potion.

quests.name: The Corsair Curse
quests.short_hint: Help the Corsairs investigate a curse by talking to crew and exploring nearby areas.

quests.name: Below Ice Mountain
quests.short_hint: Join Willow's crew, assemble the team, and explore the ruins beneath Ice Mountain.
